title: Understanding the Range
text: To find the percentage of students taller than $$150$$ cm but shorter than $$180$$ cm, identify the total number of students within this height range.

title: Calculate the Total
text: Determine the total number of students in the class. This will help you calculate the percentage.

title: Find the Percentage
text: Use the formula: (Number of students in range / Total number of students) * $$100$$ to find the percentage.

title: Calculate the Percentage
text: If there are $$15$$ students in the range and $$20$$ students in total, what is the percentage?
